item.title: Cracker Barrel scraps new logo after outrage from customers, Trump
item.description: President Donald Trump's criticism came a day after Cracker Barrel told customers the company could have better handled its controversial logo rebrand...

item.title: Trump tells Fed's Lisa Cook she's fired; she says 'he has no authority to do so'
item.description: President Donald Trump's removal of a Federal Reserve governor could end up being challenged at the Supreme Court.

item.title: Lisa Cook will sue over Trump firing from Fed board, her lawyer says
item.description: President Trump pointed to allegations of mortgage fraud by Lisa Cook in saying she was fired as a governor of the Federal Reserve Board.

item.title: Fed responds to Trump effort to fire Lisa Cook, notes president needs 'cause'
item.description: Federal Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook hired Abbe Lowell to fight her termination by President Trump for a case that could land at the Supreme Court...

item.title: Trump says he'll have a Fed 'majority' soon to push rates lower after firing Cook
item.description: President Donald Trump said he will soon have a "majority" of preferred members on the Federal Reserve board who will back his desire to slash interes...
